name: Crashbot Arena
description:
Entry for Ludum Dare 42: running out of space.

Survive as long as you can in the roborena, as the scrap of your defeated enemies piles up!

Why are you fighting? Mechs.

Who are you fighting? Mechs.

Instruction

WASD to move, mouse button to shoot, standard twin-stick shooter setup.

All feedback is welcome as we look into developing this game further.
